# requestAuthorization(sensors:completion:)

**Type Method**

Requests user permission to read one or more sensors.

## Declaration

```swift
class func requestAuthorization(sensors: Set<SRSensor>, completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
class func requestAuthorization(sensors: Set<SRSensor>) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **sensors**: One or more sensors your app requests.
- **completion**: A closure to run after the framework determines user authorization.

## Discussion

Call this function for sensors in which [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensorReader/authorizationStatus] is [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRAuthorizationStatus/notDetermined] to display a prompt that requests user authorization. When the prompt dismisses, the framework calls the `completion` closure. Your delegate needs to wait for a call to [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensorReaderDelegate/sensorReader(_:didChange:)] to determine whether the user approves sensor access.

If you pass a sensor into this function for which the user already answered the in-app prompt, the framework cancels the prompt with [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRError/Code/promptDeclined]. When the user has already answered the prompt for a particular sensor, its [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensorReader/authorizationStatus] is [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRAuthorizationStatus/authorized] or [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRAuthorizationStatus/denied]. The user may change the authorization status for a sensor in Settings > Privacy > Research Sensor & Usage Data.

For more information about the authorization workflow, see [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/configuring-your-project-for-sensor-reading].

## Checking user authorization

- **authorizationStatus**: The status of the user’s agreement to let the app access this reader’s sensor.
- **SRAuthorizationStatus**: The states that model whether the user approves the app to read a particular sensor.
